title: Sy Presten, Press Agent So Old-Fashioned He Was News, Dies at 98
description: He fed material to gossip columns, buttered up reporters and banged on typewriters from the heyday of the Copacabana to the rise of reality TV.
dc:creator: Alex Traub
media:credit: Chester Higgins Jr./The New York Times
media:description: The press agent Sy Presten in 2002. “Despite the fact that down through the years I’ve met hundreds of notables,” he once said, “it’s still a great thrill to meet one.”
